directions: Place oats into a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®). Add water, almond milk, apple, dates, rosemary, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and salt. Stir until ingredients are just combined. Close and lock the lid. Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 4 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
Let sit for 5 minutes before releasing pressure using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid.
Stir cooked oatmeal and top with chopped pecans.
ingredients: 1 large apple - peeled, cored, and diced
⅓ cup dried pitted dates, diced
1 teaspoon chopped pecans, or to taste  (Optional)
title: Instant Pot® Apple-Rosemary Steel-Cut Oats
